lines.text: Y'know some are sayin' that it really was the cops who shot those men.
You must be new to this town, mister. Only Al Capone kills like that.
Wanna know something Jack? I like a guy who can use his head for something beside a hatrack!

[to Frank Gusenberg after the shooting]
I've got to tell you Frank, you're not going to make it. Want me to call a preacher?

[nervously]
If you don't like the beer, mister, you don't have to pay for it.
Well now, ain't you the cat's pajamas!
Hello, boys. Something I can do for you?
